creature_ability: Spinning Sweep   Requirements  Volodmyra successfully Strikes a second enemy when making a sweep attack with her axe and is within 10 feet of a third enemy she hasn't yet attacked
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Volodmyra](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2221)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Volodmyra](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2221)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 38</row>

**Perception** +7

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +9, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Chain Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9), _+1 [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)_, [lesser healing potions](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (4), jade and pearl necklace, [silver ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277) (worth 30 gp), [_tracker's goggles_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=467)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 48

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greataxe_ +11 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d12+4 slashing

**Overhand Smash** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Requirements** Volodmyra is wielding her greataxe and is adjacent to an enemy; **Effect** Volodmyra raises her greataxe above her head and puts all of her might into a single attack. If the attack hits, Volodmyra deals an additional 8 points of damage and the opponent must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save to avoid being knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

**Spinning Sweep  **Requirements** Volodmyra successfully Strikes a second enemy when making a sweep attack with her axe and is within 10 feet of a third enemy she hasn't yet attacked** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Effect** Volodmyra spins in a circle (Stepping 5 feet if she chooses) and makes a third attack against a foe she hasn't attacked this round. This third attack suffers only a –8 penalty to the attack roll (instead of the standard –10 on a third Strike). If it hits, Volodmyra deals an additional 2d6 points of damage from the furious impact.

</column>
name: Volodmyra

text: Volodmyra Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 28 Unspecific Lore : DC 26 Specific Lore : DC 23 Volodmyra Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 38 Perception +7 Languages Common, Jotun Skills Acrobatics +7, Athletics +9, Deception +9, Society +7, Stealth +5 Str +4 Dex +2 Con +2 Int +0 Wis +0 Cha +2 Items Chain Mail, +1 greataxe , lesser healing potions (4), jade and pearl necklace, silver ring (worth 30 gp), tracker's goggles --- AC 18 Fort +11 Ref +9 Will +7 HP 48 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action greataxe +11 (Magical, Sweep), Damage 1d12+4 slashing Overhand Smash Two Actions Requirements Volodmyra is wielding her greataxe and is adjacent to an enemy; Effect Volodmyra raises her greataxe above her head and puts all of her might into a single attack. If the attack hits, Volodmyra deals an additional 8 points of damage and the opponent must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save to avoid being knocked prone. Spinning Sweep Requirements Volodmyra successfully Strikes a second enemy when making a sweep attack with her axe and is within 10 feet of a third enemy she hasn't yet attacked Single Action Effect Volodmyra spins in a circle (Stepping 5 feet if she chooses) and makes a third attack against a foe she hasn't attacked this round. This third attack suffers only a –8 penalty to the attack roll (instead of the standard –10 on a third Strike). If it hits, Volodmyra deals an additional 2d6 points of damage from the furious impact.
